159.job_description: Summary Join Aperia Solutions, a leader in SaaS solutions for the Payments and Compliance industries. Aperia is a Texas-based fintech and managed consultancy firm that creates custom SaaS applications and other software-based solutions for the payments, banking, and processing industry. Founded in 1999, Aperia offers business intelligence, risk management, compliance, and customer intelligence platforms. With offices in Dallas, Washington DC, and Vietnam, Aperia is a fast-paced, global organization that strives to improve efficiency in compliance, risk, and customer service operations. Aperia’s clients include banks, processors, payment facilitators, merchant service providers, independent sales organizations, and government entities. A career at Aperia promises a great challenge, culture, and opportunities to forge your own path.  Job Description At Aperia, we rely on a dynamic team of engineers to solve many challenges and puzzles of our rapidly evolving technical stack. We’re seeking a full stack developer who is ready to work with new technologies and architectures in a forward-thinking organization that’s always pushing boundaries. This person will have complete, end-to-end responsibilities of projects. The ideal candidate has experience building products across the stack and a firm understanding of web frameworks, microservices patterns, APIs, databases, and multiple back-end languages. The full stack developer will join a software development team that uses new technologies to solve challenges for both the front-end and back-end architecture, ultimately delivering amazing experiences for global users and high-quality software outputs. Cloud transformation and AI/ML foundation knowledge would be highly recommended.  Core Responsibilities  Spend 100% efforts for joining software development activities. Work across the full stack, building highly scalable distributed solutions that enable positive user experiences and measurable business growth. Develop new features and infrastructure in support of rapidly emerging business and project requirements. Assume leadership of new projects, from conceptualization to deployment Ensure application performance, uptime, and scale, and maintain high standards for code quality and application design. Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities. Participate in all aspects of agile software development, including design, implementation, and deployment. Work with Architect, DevOps and development teams to provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale. Work primarily in .Net, React, and JavaScript/TypeScript Develop/propose technical materials and processes Recommend new tools, techniques, methodologies needed to enhance productivity and quality Engage with designers and front-end engineers and collaborate with leading back-end engineers to create reliable APIs Collaborate across time zones via Teams, SharePoint, Azure Board, Git comments, documents, and attend frequent video conferences. Join team training and upskilling programs, and technical sharing sessions  Functional Responsibilities  Respond appropriately and competently to the demands of work challenges when confronted with changes, ambiguity, adversity, and other pressures. Working with an Agile SDLC using SAFe/Scrum, TDD/BDD, Git, Azure DevOps, etc. Join scrum teams for resolution of technical issues and development of the products.  Technical Skills  5+ years proven experience as a Full Stack Software Developer (.NET, ReactJS) building large-scale software applications and experience in joining software development teams located in different locations. Foundation knowledge of OOP, data structure and algorithms, software design patterns, AI/ML (nice to have) Experience as an expert in Microservices, SOA, n-tier architecture design Strong experience in building web applications, designing and integrating RESTful APIs Experience in multiple front-end languages and libraries (e.g. HTML/ CSS/SASS/SCSS, AJAX, JavaScript/TypeScript, XML, Bootstrap, React, Redux, Node.js) Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python) Experience with The Secure Software Development Framework (SSDF) and adherence to Secure Development Lifecycle (SDL) methodologies. Excellent debugging and optimization skills Experience in unit/integration testing and Test-Driven Development Experience developing microservices to support web applications Web performance infrastructure (CDNs, caching, reverse-proxies), cloud resources (Azure) Experience with multiple databases (e.g. MSSQL, MySQL, CosmosDB), web servers, Kubernetes, containers, Azure services, and UI/UX design principles Experience in supporting and troubleshooting high availability, Realtime, production applications. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and associated tools. Experience in working under a DevOps model.  Things that will separate you from the rest  Excellent communication and teamwork skills Great attention to detail and organizational skills Experience in using Azure Board/Jira for task tracking and Git source control. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, including root cause analysis Ability to work on multiple concurrent projects Good at English communication (written & verbal)  Schedule  Monday to FridayWorking Place:HCMC: The Six8 Building, 24-26 Phan Dinh Giot, Tan Binh District. Da Nang: VDB Tower, 74 Quang Trung, Hai Chau District  Benefits  Health insurance Dental insurance Paid time off Parental leave Childcare assistance

163.job_description: We are the Vietnam’s No.1 mobile game publisher by gross revenue and scaling our global market. Communicate project requirements, technical challenges, and progress updates to team members and stakeholders.Yêu cầuBachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or equivalent Extensive experience (minimum 5 years) in backend software development, preferably in the gaming industry.1. Deep knowledge of game backend services development and related technologies such as Skynet, Nakama, SmartFoxServer, Photon Engine, or similar. Solid knowledge of event processing models, parallel programming, multi-threading, enterprise integration pattern, Socket, Web Service, and REST Experience with database design, optimization, and query tuning databases like NoSQL/SQL (MongoDB, Redis, PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.) and Caching Experience with version control tools like Git and CI/CD systems. Experience with technologies used in real-time data analytics such as Apache Kafka, Apache Storm, etc  2. Softskills/Leadership Competencies Strong problem-solving Leadership abilities and the capability to provide guidance and mentorship Effectively collaboration with cross-functional teams and stakeholders Project management skills, including the ability to coordinate and prioritize tasks

164.job_description: Do you love sharing unique stories through design and web development?Are you passionate about improving the user experience?Do you enjoy working with a dynamic team to develop a unique and compelling product?At Paradox, we believe when you get the people's things right you can build teams that can change the world. We’re a high performance culture with laser focus on building world class products and a team that our clients love. Our flagship product, Olivia, is the AI assistant helping companies around the world reimagine the way they hire: conversations instead of job applications, automated interview scheduling, and so much more. We’re looking for top performers who have a track record of success and want to build a company together as we continue our triple-digit growth and expand our global footprint.We are looking for a talented Front-end Web Developer who shares our excitement for helping organizations recruit and hire through our best-in-class websites, built from scratch to showcase their unique career opportunities and share their stories. This is an exciting opportunity to roll up your sleeves and bring your web design, CSS/HTML, and Javascript skills to a large number of web-based design-build for a range of diverse clients and projects.You will be an integral member of the Product and Engineering team at Paradox, working collaboratively with product managers, engineers, and client-facing teams to build and ship bespoke websites for our clients.Sound like your perfect fit? We want to hear from you!As a Front-end Web Developer, you will:  Evaluate, develop, and deliver based on design mocks and wireframes per clients’ needs and goals. Partner with our client success and design teams to bring to life the unique story and ethos of each client. Use your CSS/HTML expertise to execute design plans and build websites. Assist in the creation of new frameworks and components using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Perform required maintenance, updates, and debugging of existing sites as directed by the design and product team. Approach each build with a balance of speed, attention to detail, and flexibility to the changing needs of the project and their team. Participate in the design, development, and support of technical projects from design to completion according to project standards and competing priorities. Job requirements:  2 years of experience of hands-on front-end development building websites using Javascript, HTML, CSS, etc. Experience with VueJS or Nuxt JS is an advantage. Good command of English. Functional experience with storing, tracking, collaborating, and version control of code via GitHub. Experience implementing responsive web design principles to ensure that client websites render well across multiple devices. Experience with taking designs via Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma (preferred) and independently building sites to specifications. Excellent problem-solving skills with working through complex issues. Able to build reusable codes for future use and share among front-end websites. Possess an open mindset, embracing new ideas, perspectives, and approaches. Be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment, and managing various deadlines. Portfolio or samples of previous website development work. Why You Should Work at Paradox: - Work side by side with a global team of passionate and purposeful people - Talent is our DNA and we pride ourselves on having the best!  Develop amazing products to serve clients who are leading corporations around the world. Ability to make a big impact on a growing organization and drive your own career. The opportunity to build the next big thing in recruiting technology. Professional development opportunities. Benefits package includes:Competitive performance-based salary, annual performance bonus, and 13th-month salary bonus; Annual salary review; Healthcare package with annual health check-ups and premium medical insurance; Free lunch; Petrol allowance; House allowance; In-house English class; Family Care package with medical insurance and child care allowance; Loyalty bonus plan; And heaps of internal events and team buildings to enjoy. To learn more about how we're disrupting the recruiting industry, check out our website: paradox.ai  To know more about our social life, visit our fan page: www.fb.com/ParadoxVietnam  Contact our HR team: jobs.vn@paradox.ai | Skype: live:hr_17855 | Phone: (+84) 236 3788099

166.job_description: Company Overview At Motorola Solutions, we're guided by a shared purpose - helping people be their best in the moments that matter - and we live up to our purpose every day by solving for safer. Because people can only be their best when they not only feel safe, but are safe. We're solving for safer by building the best possible technologies across every part of our safety and security ecosystem. That's mission -critical communications devices and networks, AI-powered video security & access control and the ability to unite voice, video and data in a single command center view. We're solving for safer by connecting public safety agencies and enterprises, enabling the collaboration that's critical to connect those in need with those who can help. The work we do here matters.  Department Overview We're seeking a talented and passionate Frontend Software Engineer to join our team and build exceptional user experiences. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality web applications that delight our users. Job DescriptionKey Responsibilities:  Design, develop, and maintain web applications using .NET Core or .NET Framework. Build intuitive, user-friendly interfaces with Angular. Work closely with backend developers to ensure seamless integration between frontend and backend systems. Develop RESTful APIs and ensure seamless integration with the front-end. Optimize front-end code for speed, responsiveness, and scalability to deliver a smooth user experience. Write clear and concise documentation for your code to facilitate maintainability and collaboration. Conduct thorough testing of your code to ensure quality and resolve any bugs or issues effectively. Continuously learn and adapt to emerging technologies and best practices in frontend development.#LI-MM8  Basic Requirements  Skills and Qualifications:  Bachelor Degree in Information Technology or relevant field. Minimum of 2 years in web development using .NET and/or .NET Framework and Angular (including TypeScript and RxJS). Experience with C#, ASP.NET MVC, and Web API. Must have strong knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.Preferred:  Familiarity with SQL databases. Experience with Git or similar version control systems. Good verbal and written communication skills in English#LI-MM8  Travel Requirements Under 10% Relocation Provided None Position Type Experienced Referral Payment Plan No EEO Statement  Motorola Solutions is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally-protected characteristic.  We are proud of our people-first and community-focused culture, empowering every Motorolan to be their most authentic self and to do their best work to deliver on the promise of a safer world. If you’d like to join our team but feel that you don’t quite meet all of the preferred skills, we’d still love to hear why you think you’d be a great addition to our team.  We’re committed to providing an inclusive and accessible recruiting experience for candidates with disabilities, or other physical or mental health conditions. To request an accommodation, please email ohr@motorolasolutions.com.

168.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)  Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một Business Analyst (BA) có kinh nghiệm trong ngành phần mềm để tham gia vào đội ngũ của chúng tôi. Bạn sẽ làm việc chặt chẽ với các nhóm phát triển, quản lý dự án và các bên liên quan để phân tích yêu cầu nghiệp vụ, định hướng giải pháp và đảm bảo các dự án blockchain hoặc phần mềm khác được thực hiện thành công.  Trách nhiệm chính:  Thu thập và phân tích yêu cầu nghiệp vụ từ các bên liên quan và khách hàng. Làm việc với nhóm phát triển để xác định các giải pháp công nghệ phù hợp nhằm giải quyết các vấn đề kinh doanh. Phân tích, soạn thảo tài liệu mô tả nghiệp vụ (BRD, FRD) và các tài liệu kỹ thuật liên quan. Xây dựng và duy trì các tài liệu đặc tả về hệ thống, giải pháp và luồng công việc. Đánh giá và phân tích các giải pháp công nghệ hiện có và đề xuất các cải tiến. Tư vấn và tham mưu cho các bên liên quan về xu hướng công nghệ và ảnh hưởng của công nghệ này đối với quy trình kinh doanh. Quản lý và giám sát các dự án từ khâu lập kế hoạch đến triển khai. Thực hiện kiểm thử chấp nhận người dùng (UAT) để đảm bảo hệ thống đáp ứng đúng yêu cầu. Đóng vai trò cầu nối giữa nhóm phát triển và các bên liên quan để đảm bảo việc triển khai dự án diễn ra suôn sẻ.Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Mức lương cạnh tranh và phúc lợi hấp dẫn. Cơ hội làm việc trong một môi trường công nghệ cao, sáng tạo và đầy thử thách. Tham gia vào các dự án blockchain tiên tiến và có ảnh hưởng lớn trong ngành. Tham gia vào các dự án sự kiện, hội thảo, training của đối tác, Hiệp hội Blockchain VN, Viện nghiên cứu ABAII,... Cơ hội phát triển sự nghiệp và thăng tiến trong một công ty đang phát triển nhanh chóng.Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí Business Analyst trong ngành phần mềm. Kỹ năng phân tích nghiệp vụ và giải quyết vấn đề xuất sắc. Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt, có khả năng làm việc với các bên liên quan để thu thập và xác định yêu cầu. Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và quản lý thời gian hiệu quả. Kỹ năng tổ chức, lập kế hoạch và quản lý dự án. Có kiến thức về quy trình phát triển phần mềm (SDLC) và các phương pháp phát triển Agile/Scrum. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc với công nghệ blockchain, AI hoặc các dự án công nghệ mới là một điểm cộng. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ quản lý dự án và yêu cầu như Jira, Confluence, hoặc tương tự.Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: Data Analytics,IT Phần Mềm,Quản Lý Dự Án (IT),SQL,Triển Khai Phần MềmTrung cấp - Nghề  Không yêu cầu

171.job_description: Murex is a global fintech leader in trading, risk management and processing solutions for capital markets. Operating from our 19 offices, 3 000 Murexians from over 60 different nationalities ensure the development, implementation and support of our platform which is used by banks, asset managers, corporations and utilities, across the world. Join Murex and work on the challenges of an industry at the forefront of innovation and thrive in a people-centric environment. You’ll be part of one global team where you can learn fast and stay true to yourself. We are seeking an experienced and dynamic team leader to join our growing team. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in leading and upskilling a team of junior software test engineers, ensuring the highest standards of testing methodologies and practices. As the Test Engineering Team Lead, you will contribute to the success of our projects by providing effective people management, mentorship, and fostering a culture of continuous learning within the team. Test Engineering Team Lead for Integration ComponentsAs the Test Engineering Team Lead for Integration Components, you will play a pivotal role in supervising the technical design, automation, execution and resolution of the Integration test packages. Your responsibilities will include:Leadership and Team Management: Lead and inspire a team of junior test engineers, providing clear guidance, mentorship, and support. Foster a positive and collaborative team culture that encourages innovation and excellence. Effectively manage team resources, ensuring optimal allocation for project deliverables. Functional and Technical Knowledge Upskilling: Identify the skill gaps within the team and develop targeted training plans to upskill junior test engineers on Integration Components aspects of Murex and related Business Processes. Collaborate with Murex Product teams to design and conduct training sessions to enhance product knowledge related to Integration Components. Act as a mentor/tutor on functional and technical aspects to junior test engineers. Stay updated on test management trends and best practices to ensure the team's skills remain cutting-edge.What you will do: Supervision of Test Packages: Oversee the design and build of Trading test packages, ensuring they align with the stream's objectives. Execution and Resolution: Supervise the execution and resolution of test packages, complying with the target objectives set by the Test Unit Manager for Murex Vietnam. Support and Escalation: Act as the first level of escalation for Test Engineers in the Test operations, providing support and guidance, particularly during the resolution of failed tests (e.g. “greening”) Training Recommendations: Recommend relevant training programs based on the scope of RTPs and identified gaps in resources. Stream Management: Oversee the day-to-day operations of the Trading Stream, applying the common operating model in line with established processes and tools to ensure consistency and efficiency. Quality Assurance: Maintain high standards of quality and accuracy in testing processes, ensuring compliance with internal processes, industry standards, and regulations. Efficiency Enhancement:  o Propose and drive the implementation of optimization measures for RTP implementation.o Continuously improve testing processes and methodologies to increase efficiency, reduce testing cycle times, and lower operational costs.o Optimize RTP operations in terms of content and cost while maintaining high testing quality. Deliverable Capitalization: Ensure the quality and capitalization of the deliverables for the Trading stream, including impact notes and change articles. Defect Correction: Drive the defect correction process, ensuring timely and effective resolution. Team Collaboration: Work closely with the Test Unit Manager and Test leads of Murex Vietnam to foster a cohesive and productive work environment, maintaining a culture of continuous improvement. Community of Experts: Act as key member in a community of experts where you collaborate and share your knowledge to collectively advance the Test Unit and drive meaningful innovation.Other responsibilitiesOn need basis, you may also be playing the Test Lead role: Own and ensure the successful execution & analysis of Client automated test suites, Coordinate the deliverables and timelines with Murex team facing Client.Qualifications: At least 2 years in a managerial or leadership role within an IT operations environment or in a Murex support or project team. 5 years of development experience in Java, XML, XSL, JavaScript, SQL is mandatory. Experience in Unix, windows OS, able to develop scripting/batch files. Experience: Software testing and quality assurance is a big plus. Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English are mandatory. Interest in Software Testing Automation: A genuine interest in software testing automation and the willingness to gain deep expertise in Murex test automation techniques during your onboarding. Analytical Skills: Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to address complex challenges within the Integration domain. Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field. A master's degree is a plus. Experience in Murex Integration modules (Datamart, MxMLExchange, Market Data) is a plus.

173.job_description: Giới thiệu: We are a product startup in Silicon Valley looking for exceptional full-stack developers in Vietnam, who will own/build/deploy our AI-based product. You will be working and mentored by successful startup founders, who have built and sold companies in Silicon Valley and have experience working in top technology companies such as Amazon and Facebook. You will own the critical product features that have direct customer impacts. This position is NOT for someone who is looking for a steady and well-defined job but for someone who has an entrepreneurial mentality, who can embrace changes, fast execution speed, and are eager to learn/explore advanced technologies.  Job requirements More than 5 years of experience in the industry. Strong experience in building AI products serving real customers (e.g. data processing, finetuning models, building chatbot). Very good at English (verbal and written) Experience with AI Stack: Python/LLM (OpenAI, Claude)/Lang Chain/Jupyter Notebook. Preferences You are young and hungry. You love building kick-ass products so much that sometimes you forget that you are living on earth. You are willing to work really really hard regardless of time and get great reward for doing so. You have built and deployed 1 or 2 serious AI products. You have an entrepreneurial mentality. Always want to learn new things and explore new technology frontiers. Your friends found you boring because you are always talking about coding. You admit your mistakes and learn fast to not repeat the same ones. Benefits Stock options Work computer and equipments On-site business trips to company HQ in the US Health Insurance Unlimited time off Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 30000K - 40000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Bảo Hiểm Y Tế, Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe, Cơ Hội Thăng Tiến Hạn nộp: 2024-10-19 Kinh nghiệm: 5 - 6 năm Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

177.job_description: Job Overview Under guidance, responsible for creating and maintaining the IQVIA database. Essential Functions  Assures the accuracy and timeliness of additions and modifications to the common master file through input from internal and external sources, while understanding the impact of the maintenance on all stakeholders. Resolves assigned file code database exceptions through setup and/or maintenance within the file. Ensures all maintenance performed conforms to rules and protocols. Makes daily verification of maintenance performed, application of corrections as needed. Makes decisions independently and assures that they follow the protocols. Visually monitors data for any trends in the monthly and quarterly client information. Maintains documentation of quality control procedures.Qualifications  Proficiency in Windows applications (Excel, Word, Access, etc.). Good analytical and problem solving skills. Good understanding of the pharmaceutical industry and diagnoses trends. Ability to identify/eliminate repetitive problems and standardize the processes by using existing research tools and/ or help in developing new tools. IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

Phát triển Chat Bot và Voice Bot: Thiết kế, phát triển và triển khai các giải pháp AI sử dụng ChatGPT, Chat Bot, Voice Bot và Custom Data. Tích hợp công nghệ xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên (NLP) và nhận dạng giọng nói vào ứng dụng. Thực hiện công việc nghiên cứu, phân tích dữ liệu và khám phá thông tin từ các nguồn dữ liệu để phát triển mô hình và thuật toán AI hiệu quả. Thực hiện kiểm thử, gỡ lỗi và tối ưu hóa các giải pháp AI để đảm bảo tính ổn định, hiệu suất và bảo mật. Phối hợp với các bộ phận khác để hoàn thành và đảm bảo tiến độ. Theo dõi, đánh giá và báo cáo hoạt động của chương trình AI.  Yêu cầu ứng viênCó ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực AI. Hiểu biết sâu về các khái niệm, thuật toán và framework AI. Kinh nghiệm trong việc phát triển giải pháp AI, đặc biệt là trong OpenAI , ChatGPT , Chat Bot, Voice Bot và Custom Data. Kiến thức về xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên (NLP) và nhận dạng giọng nói. Tư duy và tính sáng tạo để hiểu phát triển mô hình AI theo nhu cầu của công ty.  Quyền lợiThời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6: 8h - 17h30 (nghỉ trưa 1h30') Làm việc trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp, có nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến. Cung cấp đầy đủ trang thiết bị để phục vụ công việc. Công ty đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN đầy đủ. Được hưởng các chính sách phúc lợi theo quy định của công ty (Review lương hàng năm, lương tháng 13, thưởng KPI, 12 ngày phép, mừng sinh nhật, phụ cấp ăn trưa, gửi xe,...) Thường xuyên đào tạo, nâng cao nghiệp vụ. Tham gia các hoạt động văn hóa mang màu sắc đặc trưng của công ty: Team building, cùng chuỗi hoạt động tập thể thú vị, hấp dẫn diễn ra hàng tháng, hàng quý tại công ty. Lương cạnh tranh.  Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 12000K - 16000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Bảo Hiểm Y Tế, Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe, Cơ Hội Phát Triển Hạn nộp: 2024-11-13 Kinh nghiệm: 2 - 3 năm Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

182.job_description: Summary Join Aperia Solutions, a leader in SaaS solutions for the Payments and Compliance industries. Aperia is a Texas-based fintech and managed consultancy firm that creates custom SaaS applications and other software-based solutions for the payments, banking, and processing industry. Founded in 1999, Aperia offers business intelligence, risk management, compliance, and customer intelligence platforms. With offices in Dallas, Washington DC, and Vietnam, Aperia is a fast-paced, global organization that strives to improve efficiency in compliance, risk, and customer service operations. Aperia’s clients include banks, processors, payment facilitators, merchant service providers, independent sales organizations, and government entities. A career at Aperia promises a great challenge, culture, and opportunities to forge your own path.  Job Description As a transformation Solutions Architect you have mastered technology ecosystems, their design, implementation, and operation, all to support business objectives. You understand that the most elegant design is useless if it does not lead to return on investment and cannot be implemented in stages to meet the fast-paced world we live in. If you are enthusiastic about scalable, extensible, and maintainable architectures, and helping clients truly connect with their customers, we would like to meet you. Our team strives to improve architecture outcomes across a wide variety of initiatives and verticals with a goal to move the needle on delivering Aperia’s technical and business strategies. You will be responsible for consulting engagements with groups both inside and outside of Aperia. You will work independently to assess how you can maximize your value, and to agree success criteria and measures for the engagement. Examples of the type of work you will get involved in include bringing together business and technology teams to define the strategic architecture for customers; collaborating across multiple technology teams to solve problems in an imaginative way; or guiding project teams to co-create architecture principles, solutions, or roadmaps.Core Responsibilities  Have experience across a wide variety of architecture engagements in multiple areas of business/technology. Identify, qualify, and propose strategy, initiatives and solutions aligned with business outcomes. Develop and communicate the customer outcomes for technical solutions. Collaborate across different technology teams to ensure true end-to-end solutions. Lead planning and prioritization activities, coordinating the evaluation, deployment, and management of existing and target architectures. Provide subject matter expertise to identify and recommend workable solutions to clients. Work with the project management to develop the overall implementation solution plan and serve as a lead, as required, overseeing aspects of the project life cycle, from the initial kickoff through the requirements analysis, design, and implementation phases for projects within solution area. Work with data integration technologies to design and implement new solutions and processes for clients to support new customer experience strategies. Work with business and technology client representatives to gather functional and technical requirements. Create API and ETL designs. Participate in client facing meetings and documenting key decisions and action items. Serve as the architecture lead for application and integration team. Keep informed of the latest technology trends, platforms, and innovations especially in the areas of finance, compliance, customer data management, and data integration. Collaborate with product management and business owners, solutions architects work closely with product management and business owners to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable and flexible system designs. Define the architecture and design of the solutions developed within the SAFe framework to create and maintain architectural runway, identify key architectural components, and ensure that the architecture aligns with the SAFe principles and practices. Guide agile teams by providing technical leadership and architectural direction by assisting teams in making technology decisions, resolving technical challenges, and ensuring that the architecture is implemented correctly within the Agile Release Train (ART) or Solution Train context. Participate in solution and system demos to highlight the architectural aspects of the solution to demonstrate how the architecture supports the desired functionality, performance, security, and other non-functional requirements defined in SAFe. Ensure the quality and compliance of the solution architecture within the SAFe by collaborating with other architects, including Enterprise Architects, to ensure architectural consistency, adherence to standards, and compliance with organizational policies and regulatory requirements. Communicate relentlessly with team, manager, leadership, and sponsors to ensure transparency. Effectively work on multiple concurrent projects and with multiple competing priorities.  Technical Skills  Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science, Business, or equivalent technology degree/experience 4+ years of proven architecture experience Agile software development environment experience Knowledge of architecting enterprise-level applications for Windows, SQL, NoSQL databases Strong asynchronous programming capabilities: MySQL, REST, JSON, SOA, XML, Redis Sound knowledge of tools such as Git, Jenkins, Vagrant and Ansible Experience with .NET, CI/CD, Python, Jupyter Azure and/or AWS Experience in the Financial or Electronic Payment Processing industry is a plus 5+ years of proven architecture experience Experience with Azure or AWS Strong understanding of DevOps principles Experience working in agile environments. Strong customer facing and presentation skills as well as proven analytical and problem-solving abilities. Experience and understanding of architecture, consultancy, and delivery methodologies. Experience and understanding of technology practices, particularly across data and integration areas. A collaborative and initiative-taking approach, with an ability to story-tell and communicate technical information to a non-technical audience. A willingness to challenge the status quo and influence it on a senior level. A strong knowledge of the current/future state of industry technology solutions and trends.  Education or Certifications  Degree in Computer Science or related fields.  Work Location (Hybrid)  The Six8 Building: 24-26 Phan Dinh Giot, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City  Benefits  Health insurance Dental insurance Paid time off Parental leave Childcare assistance Education reimbursement  This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. An employee may also perform other reasonable related business duties as assigned by their immediate supervisor or management.  Principals only. Recruiters please don't contact this job poster. DO NOT contact us with unsolicited services or offers.

183.job_description: Prudential’s purpose is to be partners for every life and protectors for every future. Our purpose encourages everything we do by creating a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our people, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and we support our people’s career ambitions. We pledge to make Prudential a place where you can Connect, Grow, and Succeed.  This role will lead a team of data warehouse engineers in designing, building and maintaining our data warehouse. You will also be responsible for working with stakeholders to identify and prioritize data warehousing needs.Accountability(1) Deliver data quality of Data Warehouse team (2) Build & develop capability of data warehouse team (3) Deliver data service which act as a feasible, reliable, transparent data source for advanced analysis & AI/ML models purpose. (4) Contribute & driven in enhance data security & data governance framework. Key Responsibilities(1) Maintain and Enhance Data Quality:  Contribute, follow & enforce data quality standards and guidelines to ensure accurate, reliable, and robust data warehouse services.  (2) Build, Deliver & Monitor Data Services:  Define data warehouse models, build and deliver reliability and efficiency data warehouse services, ensure adherence to quality standard, and optimize for analytics purpose.  (3) Collaborate and Advise:  Monitor team's resource(budget, personnel, hardware, software, ...), communicate & work with IT team, to ensure the stability of infrastructure for data science projects & data warehouse services. Work closely with data science, data analysis, and data delivery team to identify and prioritize data warehousing needs. Communicate quality standards to teams and provide training and support as necessary.  (4) Documentation:  Ensure thorough documentation of data quality standards, procedures, and guidelines.  (5) Continuous Development:  Involve in team's activity & strengthen team's engagement. Manage a team up to 4 members, provide guidance support in task delivery & skillset improvement. Identify & develop required skillset that best fit for company & personal career path. Demand & Productivity driver 5 years or experience working in Data Engineer with 2 years at project lead level. Strong technical understanding & experience of data modeling, data warehousing architecture and ETL process. Strong programming skills (e.g., Python, SQL, ...) Strong Technical understanding of Big Data technology and open source system. Experience in hands-on, planning, organizing, and managing resource in deliver data warehouse project. Strong understanding of data quality delivery(term, process, framework, tools, ...). Well communicate skill with internal team and external client stakeholder. Experience with cloud computing platforms.Education Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology Engineer, or equivalent fields. Master’s degree in Computer Science, Financial analysis business fields (e.g. MBA, Finance, Business Analytics, etc.) would be considered as a strong plusKey Stakeholders Internal Data Platform team Regional Data Community of Practice  Prudential is an equal opportunity employer. We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with individual physical or mental health requirements.

184.job: Chuyên gia Danh mục dữ liệu/ Data Catalog Senior Specialist
184.job_description: Khối / Ban Khối Dịch vụ Công nghệ Ngân hàngLĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tinĐịa điểm Hồ Chí MinhLoại hình công việc Fulltime (toàn thời gian)Thời hạn ứng tuyển 07/11/2024Số lượng cần tuyển 1Mô tả công việc Mục tiêu: Responsible for developing and maintaining data catalog, ensuring data assets are well-organized, accessible and effectively governed under VIB frameworks and policy standards. This role requires a deep and strong understanding of data management principles, metadata, and data governance practices.  Trách nhiệm: Create, maintain, and update a comprehensive data catalog that includes metadata, data lineage, and data classifications; Apply processes for discovering and documenting new data sources and assets; Manage and standardize metadata across various data sources; Ensure metadata is accurate, consistent, and easily accessible to users; Evaluate, implement and optimize data catalog tools to meet organizational needs; Provide training, coaching, and support to colleagues on data governance best practices, tools, and techniques in term of data access and utilization; Stayed up to date with industry trends and best practice in data management and identify opportunity for improvements; Perform other tasks requested by line manager.  Yêu cầu: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Data Management, Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field; Experience: 5+ years (Senior Specialist)/3+ years (Specialist)/2+ years (Senior Officer)/1+ year (Officer) of experience in data governance or similar role within the life insurance industry or other relevant financial services sector; Technical skills: proficiency with data catalog tools (e.g., Glue, Alation, Collibra, Informatica), SQL, data modeling, and ETL processes; Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data and provide actionable insights; Demonstrated ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and adapt quickly to changing priorities in a fast-paced environment; Communication and interpersonal skills: Excellent communication and presentation skills, along with the ability to effectively interact with stakeholders at all levels within the organization; Compliance and data security: Understanding of regulations related to data security and privacy

185.job_description: PATH is a global nonprofit dedicated to achieving health equity. With more than 40 years of experience forging multisector partnerships and with expertise in science, economics, technology, advocacy, and dozens of other specialties, PATH develops and scales up innovative solutions to the world’s most pressing heath challenges. PATH seeks a Project Assistant or Senior Project Assistant, based in Ho Chi Minh City to provide administrative, programmatic and logistical support for the multi-year USAID Strengthening Local Health Security Activity in Vietnam. The goal of the project is to strengthen Vietnam’s capacity at the sub-national levels to effectively prevent, detect, and respond to epidemic-prone emerging infectious diseases (EID) through One Health (human, animal, and environment) approaches to achieve Global Health Security targets for zoonotic diseases (ZDs), EID surveillance and response, and risk communications and community engagement (now called “project”).  Key responsibilities and duties include: Provide support to Chief of Party (Responsible Project Manager/RPM)/ Deputy Chief of Party/ team leaders/program staff in the implementation and monitoring of project activities in four project provinces in the South of Vietnam and directly report to Project Administrator (PADM)  Provide administrative support to secure all necessary in-country approvals.  Provide logistical support and liaise with partners to arrange meetings, trainings, workshops, field trips and other travel.  Coordinate with Vietnam Country Program administrative team to arrange travel for project staff, consultants and visitors.  Take notes at meetings and workshops and prepare/distribute minutes in a timely manner.  Format project documents and presentations.  Assist in interpretation and translation of project documents and materials.  Organize, assemble, and distribute reports, communication and advocacy materials, and other documents.  Support PADM and Project Financial Officer in the preparation and monitoring of project budgets.  Under instruction from RPM/PADM, provide support to procure goods and services for projects including data entry into the PATH’s systems.  Assist with the development, coordination, and monitoring of sub-contracts, sub-agreements, consultant agreements, work orders, purchase orders and other agreements.  Train staff in meeting logistics such as calling into conference lines, meeting bookings, and car bookings.  Provide support to financial team in financial management.  Provide other administrative support as required.  Required Experiences and Skills: Bachelor’s degree with a minimum of five (5) years of work experience in a similar role.  Work experience in international non-governmental organizations (INGO) or in public health programs preferred.  Excellent skills with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook and Teams.  Excellent organizational skills.  Good communication skills.  Proven interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively in a team.  Excellent written and spoken ability in Vietnamese and English.  Willingness and ability to travel within Vietnam.  Strong attention to detail, with a commitment to accountability, transparency, and integrity in all tasks.  Location: Based at PATH office, Ho Chi Minh City office Division: Asia, Middle East and Europe (AMEE) Duration: Life of projectPATH is dedicated to building an inclusive workforce where diversity is valued.  PATH is an equal opportunity employer. Every qualified applicant will be considered for employment.  PATH does not discriminate based on race, color, religion, caste, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, age, national origin, marital status, disability status, political ideology, military or protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.

186.job_description: The private capital market hosts $14 trillion of investment that funds massive innovation around the world; yet much of it still operates on manual processes and fragmented legacy systems. Think of the New York City subway system running on analog machines! Anduin’s mission is to revolutionize investing in the alts and empower LP-GP relationships by building better workflows, data processes, and technology integrations. Our award-winning products, Fund Subscription, Data Room, and Investor Access, have raised almost $102 billion in capital across 40,000+ investors for venture capital, private equity, and hedge funds. In 2023, nearly 5% of all global capital raised was through Anduin, and we’re just getting started! Since our founding in 2014, we’ve brought together deep private market expertise with leading technologists. Our world-class team has grown to over 140+ talented individuals across Asia, Canada, Europe, and the US all focused on transforming private market transactions. Anduin is looking for Software Engineers, Product development, who want to move fast, and to be the first to solve intractable real world problems. We empower our engineers to own the vision and make it 10x bigger. We want our people to be bold, to dream big, to take risks and to learn from trying (and failing).  Job Responsibilities:You have the will and grit to push past tough obstacles and help build an important company from the ground up. You have the curiosity to explore domains outside your own and the instinct to leverage radical solutions to make our users successful. You obsess over software performance and constantly challenge yourself and others to deliver highly scalable, low latency, reliable and fast computation platforms. You maintain a high bar for coding excellence and a passion for design and architecture. Collaborate with products, designers, QAs, and Customer Success teams across the company to bring the best of the breed features and experience to our customers. Our technology stack: Akka, Scala, Docker, FoundationDB, AWS, Scala.js and React.js.  Job Qualifications:  Must have:  Experience designing, building, deploying, operating, scaling, and evolving distributed systems and high-volume transaction application. End-to-end knowledge of modern web app architecture (including databases, API design, cloud infrastructure, and security) as well as best development practices. Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related fields or equivalent work experience. Excellent verbal communication skills.  Nice to have:  Full-stack development experience. Large AWS deployment experience. Proficiency in a Unix/Linux environment. Graduate degree (MS/PhD or PhD dropped out) or competitive programming background a plus.

187.job_description: International BBU Team Administrator - HCMAbout AstraZeneca and AstraZeneca Vietnam  AstraZeneca AstraZeneca (LSE/STO/Nasdaq: AZN) is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in Oncology, Rare Diseases and BioPharmaceuticals, including Cardiovascular, Renal & Metabolism, and Respiratory & Immunology. Based in Cambridge, UK, AstraZeneca operates in over 100 countries and its innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide. Please visit astrazeneca.com and follow the Company on Twitter @AstraZeneca.AstraZeneca Vietnam As a Foreign Invested Enterprise with over 600 members, AstraZeneca is investing into Vietnam 360 million USD from 2020 to 2030 with a focus on reducing the burdens of non-communicable diseases, developing local talent, and uplifting the domestic biopharmaceutical R&D and manufacturing capabilities. Over the last three decades accompanying Vietnam’s sustainable development, AstraZeneca has run several impactful programmes in collaboration with the Government, Ministry of Health and healthcare partners to promote disease awareness, prevention and early detection. In recent years, AstraZeneca Vietnam has received several certificates of merit from the Prime Minister and Minister of Health, for excellent contributions to Vietnam’s vaccine diplomacy, fight against COVID-19 and advancement of cancer treatment and disease awareness. The company has also been recognized among Vietnam’s Top 100 Best Places to Work (2018 – 2022) with various other industry awards from BritCham, EuroCham, and government agencies.What you’ll doJob Description Responsible for performing a variety of secretarial, administrative and project-oriented activities in support of the BBU International team, contributing to the overall implementation of International BBU strategic goals, tracking the execution of different tactic within the planned timelines. This position will provide coordination for key initiatives; conduct ad-hoc analyses on initiatives to proactively escalate issues, propose solutions and modify approaches; maintaining a continuous line of communication and close collaboration with the respective BBU commercial team members. Accountable to identify priorities and opportunities to improve execution, including budget management; partnering with the respective teams to provide high-level coordination to ensure prioritized initiatives are implemented and the outcomes measured that result in maximum market impact. This position will be responsible for contributing to drive execution, supporting the team to successfully achieve individual and organizational objectives.Typical Accountabilities  Provides administrative or secretarial services to the BBU International team, coordinating complex meetings and off-site events, diary arrangements and travel in line with AZ policy Co-ordinates, collates and communicates information at the detailed level, possibly of a technical or statistical nature Ensures the production of reports or analyses, to meet quality standards, and provides interpretation of data Reconciles figures or information from various sources, ensuring completeness and accuracy, and follow-up on discrepancies Carries out calculations, analyses or investigations to defined briefs to support the smooth functioning of the business area Resolves complex queries and issues to meet business requirements Participates in establishing an understanding of team requirements to ensure that planned activities and services meet needs, and in monitoring those services and activities to ensure requirements are fully met Prioritises workload, and that of others as appropriate, to achieve personal and work unit targets Organises, controls and delivers specific administrative activities and services under guidance from line manager Leads and motivates any assigned staff within defined parameters, ensuring they deliver their responsibilities effectively Education, Qualifications, Skills and Experience  Essential  Advanced level of written and spoken English Prior Administrative experience Ability to follow processes University/College degree or equivalent education in life science/healthcare or equivalent Excellent organizational skills, inter-personal and communication (written, spoken) skills Understanding of performance metrics and their relevance in the pharmaceutical industry Knowledge of medical information/technology systems Strong drive for performance, entrepreneurship approach High sense of urgency. Desirable  Relevant vocational qualifications or equivalent experience Broad industry oversight, understanding of key markets Previous above country experience and personal skills that allow one to be rapidly operational in the role (e.g., open-minded, creative highly dynamic and energetic) Experience of being able to challenge, influence, contract and drive change across different countries or functions Ability to operate in multi-cultural environment and influence through positive engagement Why AstraZeneca?Be bold and make a powerful impact: AstraZeneca is a world-leading business where standards are high and challenges complex, but also a collective where we build, support and motivate each other. This unique combination of strong expectation and empowerment invites you to improve how our markets work and make your individual mark. Here, you can follow your ambitions with full confidence. As part of a responsible, value-led business with a strong sustainability agenda, you can also help impact the future beyond business projects.  Be part of our growth journey and success story: Join the fastest growing pharmaceutical company in our markets, set up to fuel further growth. Make the most of our assets: our strong heritage, our early investment and commitment in emerging markets, and how we embrace digital and data to transform the patient journey. Go beyond your limits. Welcome failure as a chance to learn. There’s no better place to feel inspired, energised and try new things.  Learn and grow by embracing diverse opportunities: Experience an organisation where professional development is prized and nurtured. Access the tools and support you need to continuously learn. Then it’s up to each of us to step up, speak up and show what we can do. Take advantage of working in a global business with opportunities to move beyond your role and open international doors. At AstraZeneca, your future is in your own hands.  Urgently bring our leading pipeline to millions of patients in need: Seize the opportunity to help improve the lives of millions of patients, including in areas where patient needs are often unmet. Work with our transformative pipeline to help bring a variety of high-quality medicines to market – and ensure they are made easily accessible to as many patients as possible.  Be heard in a culture of local empowerment: AstraZeneca is set up for creativity. We encourage unity and ownership at a local level, with collaboration across the global organisation. We tailor how we work, adapting to our markets and healthcare systems. In our diverse community, every voice is important. Share your ideas and opinions openly. In our speak-up culture, the way we communicate with each other leads to more powerful innovation.So, what’s next? If you are already inspiring yourself to join our dream team, we can’t wait to hear from you. If you are ready to bring new insights and fresh thinking to the table, Brilliant! We have one seat available, and we hope it’s yours. If you’re curious to know more then please take initiative to recruitment.Vietnam@astrazeneca.com. We encourage your application.Where can I find out more?  Visit our website www.astrazeneca.vn Follow us on LinkedIn www.linkedin.com/company/astrazeneca/ and Facebook https://www.facebook.com/AstraZenecaVN Contact us via recruitment.Vietnam@astrazeneca.com

188.job_description: Job Title: Senior Java Developer Job Brief As a senior Java developer, your responsibilities cover the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering, analysis, design, develop new features, fix / enhance existing features for applications written in Java. Responsibilities  Ensure the assigned tasks to be performed on-time and with high quality. Investigate and analyze the project requirements. Join and support different teams in the system design phase. Develop new features and fix / enhance existing features. Code migration from old technology stack to new technology stack. Participate in peer code reviews and knowledge sharing. Support the project estimation and creating technical documents. To be able to mentor junior staff. Weekly and / or on-demand report to manager. Strictly follow the project and organization processes, policies and regulations.  Requirements  Bachelor degree in computer science or equivalent. At least 5 years of hands-on experience in Java, Java EE and related technologies. Experienced with one of the Java frameworks / platforms (Spring Framework, JHipster, Hibernate, Struts, JSF, …); Strong understanding of application architecture, object-oriented analysis & design (OOAD), MVC and variants, design patterns, and multi-threaded programming. Experienced with queuing and caching techniques such ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, ZeroMQ, Kafka, Memcached, Redis, etc. Hands-on experience of CI/CD and DevOps (AWS CI/CD Pipeline, Jenkins, Docker Compose, Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, etc.) is required. Experienced with the RESTful API design and implement. Familiar with one of application development and deployment tools such as GitHub, GitLab, Jira, BitBucket, Redmine, OpenProject, Microsoft Teams Services, etc. Good analytical thinking and how to determine the root cause of the issue/problem. Proactive, well self-organized and responsible in work. Good teamwork spirit and flexible in work. Good at time management skill, communication skill, problem solving skill, and presentation skill.  As a plus  Have experience working with large scale systems and enterprise systems. Good knowledge of software development processes/methodologies such as CMMi, Scrum, Kanban, etc. Having a good command of English.  What we can offer  Additional premium healthcare plan. 13th month salary and performance review annually. Training: English, Soft and Technical skills. Company trip, team building activities. Comfortable and flexible working environment.  About VSL VSL is a global software outsourcing and software consulting company which provides a wide range of services including full cycle software development, agile testing, and software consulting. Our expertise includes, but is not limited to, emerging technologies such as e-commerce, blockchain, cryptocurrency, fintech, and bots, etc. Job Features  Job Category  Artificial Intelligence (AI), Back-end, Engineering, Full-stack, Java

189.company: CÔNG TY TNHH CARE FOR VIỆT NAM
189.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 12 - 15 triệu VNĐ)  In the role of IT Technical Support An IT Technician is a professional who is responsible for installing, maintaining and repairing hardware & software components of the organization's computers. Their duties may include repairing or replacing damaged hardware, performing tests on new hardware or software, installing new equipment and logging its resolution. Responsibility Areas  Monitor, configure, troubleshoot LAN/WAN systems and network devices (switches, routers, firewalls...). Deploying and administering Server, Domain Controller, Antivirus systems. Perform virtualization of VMWare and Windows servers. Deploy and manage online meeting system. Deploying and managing the system of switchboards, surveillance cameras, timekeepers, door control. Management of sales software, accounting software and other software of the company. Manage and purchase IT equipment according to user requirements. Ensure data is stored securely and backed up regularly. Ensure smooth connection between servers. Research and propose new methods to improve computer network systems, processes, IT policies. Stay up to date with information and keep abreast of technology trends and developments.  Education and Experience  Proven experience as a System Administrator, Network Administrator or similar role. Experience with databases, networks (LAN, WAN). Knowledge of system security and data backup/recovery. Excellent diagnostic and problem solving skills.
